name: GoogleShopping
description: This API allows a user to scrape the results of a Google Shopping search.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query you want to search. You can use anything that you would use in a regular Google Shopping search. e.g. inurl:, site:, intitle:.

return: A list of Google Shopping results matching the search query.

shopping_results.title: String - Item title (Ex: 'Ryan's World Youth Headphones')
shopping_results.product_link: String - Link to the Google item page
shopping_results.serpapi_product_api: String - SerpApi URL to fetch more information about this specific product
shopping_results.extracted_price: Numeric - Item price as a float or integer (Ex: '14.95')

alternative_price.price: String - Price of an item in alternative currency
alternative_price.extracted_price: Float - Price of an item as a float

shopping_results.extracted_old_price: Numeric - Item's old price as float or integer (Ex: '15.99')
shopping_results.second_hand_condition: String - Description of condition when the product is second hand (Ex: 'used', or 'refurbished')
shopping_results.thumbnail: String - Base64 data or URL of an image
shopping_results.delivery: String - Information on delivery of the product (Ex: '$7.95 delivery')
shopping_results.number_of_comparisons: String - Number of comparisons with other sellers (Ex: '5+')
shopping_results.comparisons_link: String - Link to a page with comparative prices
shopping_results.serpapi_product_api_comparisons: String - SerpApi URL to fetch more information about this specific product's comparisons
